GPopt
===============================

version number: 0.0.1
author: Thierry Moudiki

Overview
--------

Bayesian Optimization using Gaussian Process Regression

Installation / Usage
--------------------

To install use pip:

    $ pip install GPopt


Or clone the repo:

    $ git clone https://github.com/thierrymoudiki/GPopt.git
    $ python setup.py install
